node.text_zh:
🔔 投票五部曲（必看）

🗓 7.11（六）、7.12（日）9am - 9pm，留意部份票站開放時間不同。
🏛 你可於所屬直選大區任何一個票站投票，不一定到自己區議會選區投票。
1️⃣ 所有選民均經網站投票，不用安裝應用程式。
2️⃣ 向工作人員展示以下文件：
(a) 香港永久性居民身份證
(b) 三個月內的住址證明或有效投票通知書
(c) 電子選票的QR Code截圖
詳情請瀏覽官方網站
投票時須回答有關傳統功能組別選民的問題。若你是超區選民(即不是傳統功能組別，例如衛生服務界)，請選擇「否」以進行超區投票。
node.text_en:
🔔 Official Website

🗓 7.11 (Sat), 7.12 (Sun) 9am - 9pm, some stations have different opening hours.
🏛 You can vote at any station in your LegCo 2020 district (not necessarily in your own 2019 DC Election constituency)
1️⃣ Bring your own smartphone, all voters will cast their vote through official website, there's no need to install any mobile app.
2️⃣ Provide the following documents to the station staff:
(a) HKID
(b) Address proof (issued within the last 3 months) or valid poll card of past elections
(c) Screenshot of digital ballot
For details please refer to the official website
During the voting process you will need to state if you are voter for Functional constituency. If you are voter under District Council (Second), ie you are not voter of Functional constituency (eg Health Services), please select "No" for the question.

node.text_zh: 多人票站：上水站、粉嶺站、大埔中心馬會、大埔翠屏商場
node.text_en: Busy stations: Sheung Shui Station, Fanling Station, Taipo Centre Jocky Club Betting Branch, Jade Plaza Shopping Centre

node.text_zh: 衛生服務界選民只可以去以下特定票站投票，亦可同時在就地區直選投票，不用再去其他票站。另外，初選結果只供參考。
node.text_en: Voters can only vote at the following stations, they can also cast their district vote there without heading to another voting stations. Result is reference only.
